content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@dludemy.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)

select * 
from OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
)

WITH (
    location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
) as [result]


DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
